header.content: Enjoy the Great Dining at our Orlando Hotel

post_header.content:
Delight in Fresh & Delicious Dining During Your Next Orlando Vacation

From our daily breakfast buffet to hearty Italian favorites, the dining options at Buena Vista Suites are sure to please even the pickiest palates. Start your morning with a free full American breakfast buffet in the Valencia Room, featuring cooked-to-order eggs and other favorites. In the afternoon and evening, join us for the delicious pastas, salads, seafood and fine Italian wines at the Vista Bistro Italian Eatery. In a rush? Swing by Bistro Pizza Express and grab a hot pizza, sandwich or wings to fuel your next adventure. If you don’t feel like leaving your comfortable suite, we completely understand – which is why we offer 24-hour in-suite dining services. Hotel guests are also invited to visit the restaurants and lounges at our sister property, Caribe Royale – located right next door!
